Header.title: Freeman | Art Company
Header.paragraph: Freeman Art Company provides a platform whereby collectors are free to try new pieces, either for fun, or in search of a purchase. As for the artists, FAC allows you to earn more consistent income while exposing you to more customers and metrics to grow your brand.

About.paragraph: Freeman Art Company is a fine art logistics platform connecting artists to collectors in a way that supports rising artists while exposing the community to the arts. We use technology to match collectors with artists they will find appealing, and provide a logistics platform that allows for a subscription-based payment structure.
About.subparagraph: Our mission is to revolutionize how local art is financed and supported. For the collector, their home becomes a gallery, providing new experiences year round. For the artist, their phones become a tool to earn monthly income.

Services.name: Turnkey Service
Services.text: We handle everything: curation, delivery, installation, rotation.

Services.name: Local Art
Services.text: Art is from local artists and promotes community.

Services.name: Work Spaces
Services.text: Quality art for decorating a home office or your brick and mortar.

Services.name: Dynamic Spaces
Services.text: Rotate art as often as monthly, change styles or dig deeper.

Services.name: Large Collection
Services.text: Our collection has enough art to last a lifetime, with pieces worth a lifetime.

Services.name: Flexible Pricing
Services.text: We offer both originals as well as prints to accommodate all businesses.

Features.title: Micro-Entrepreneurs
Features.text: Our platform provides you with the tools that will help you make a living from what you love.

Features.title: Monthly Income
Features.text: Subscriptions to your art are paid monthly. Collectors can even pay over-time.

Features.title: Hosting Gallery
Features.text: We provide you with a personalized gallery and profile, it's just as easy as logging in.
